scripts.build: concurrently 'cd ./atlassian && yarn build' 'cd ./full && yarn build' 'cd ./full-v2 && yarn build' 'cd ./minimal && yarn build'
scripts.deploy: yarn build && cd example-app && yarn deploy
scripts.start: concurrently 'cd ./atlassian && yarn watch' 'cd ./full && yarn watch' 'cd ./full-v2 && yarn watch' 'cd ./minimal && yarn watch' 'cd example-app && yarn start'
scripts.ssr: concurrently 'cd ./atlassian && yarn watch' 'cd ./full && yarn watch' 'cd ./minimal && yarn watch' 'cd example-ssr-app && yarn watch:client' 'cd example-ssr-app && yarn watch:server' 'cd example-ssr-app && yarn dev'
scripts.nextjs: concurrently 'cd ./atlassian && yarn watch' 'cd ./full && yarn watch' 'cd ./minimal && yarn watch' 'cd example-nextjs-app && yarn dev'
